SnapCall is a unique Chrome extension that makes it easier than ever to create and schedule calls from any website. You can quickly add video calls to any meeting event or from any email.

The extension features a simple user interface that allows you to quickly set up a call, schedule it, and then share the call link with your contacts. Once you've connected, you can start a video call with just one click. SnapCall also supports audio-only calls, making it simple to stay connected with your contacts.

SnapCall Chrome Extension allows you to:

- Start an instant call
- Schedule a call
- Manage your team calls

SnapCall offers the following :

- Full integration to 20+ platforms (Zendesk, Intercom, LiveChat, Zapierâ€¦)
- Free use for individuals
- Paid plan (only $16/month) for teams.
- Full-Web Desktop, Tablet & Mobile compatibility (no installation or app needed)

SnapCall is the perfect way to stay connected with your contacts in an easy and convenient way. With its simple user interface, you can quickly set up a call and ensure that you're connected with your contacts without any hassle.
